pages.text: Even during the steam age, you can start automating your basic ore resources.$(p)Using a sifter, compressor, multiple coke ovens, several soaking pots, a rock breaker, and two forge hammers, you can automate all the current ore types.$(p)Use all the cobalt from copper production for easy item pipes.

Power can also be automated by using a steam botany grower and coke oven for charcoal, feeding a refractory crucible supplied with cobblestone from a rock breaker.$(p)The refractory igniter can start the fire in the crucible when given a redstone signal.
